com.sap.spe.pricing.transactiondata

Interface IPricingCondition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICondition, IPricingConditionCommon
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IHeaderCondition

    public interface IPricingCondition
extends IPricingConditionCommon
    A pricing condition contains information copied from the pricing knowledge base (from the customizing of the condition type and the pricing procedure), from the condition record, and from the result of the calculation.
